title: Why is Nicki Minaj such a good rapper? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'd say it's the combination of growing up with a drug addicted father and studying singing and acting at La Guardia high school. Hip hop, in a large way, is an expression of the troubles and adversity one has experienced in life (until you can hopefully rap about how you have overcome those troubles and are now successful). Keep in mind, this is a similar upbringing to Tupac Shakur, who also studied the arts in a New York high school and grew up with an addict parent. I'm not comparing the two any further than that, but it makes sense to me that the combination of extreme family challenges, plus the opportunity to hone the expression of the feelings that those challenges have produced, makes for a good formula for being a good rapper. If you're quite attractive on top of that, it exponentially adds to the odds of success.
